MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Chocoholism--
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 『チョコくれ病びょう』――

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It is an unknown disease that causes a constant addiction for chocolate. To be fair, none of us ever seen or heard of such a disease, so Beijing named it for convenience's sake.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それはチョコを欲ほし続つづけるという未知みちの病やまいである。＊まあそんな病気びょうきはみんな見みたことも聞きいたこともなかったので、＊便宜べんぎ上じょうの問題もんだいでBeijingが名付なづけたのだが。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Phew, the seizures have finally subsided...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ、やっと発作ほっさが治おさまってくれました......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I didn't realise the symptoms of chocoholism could be this severe. Shanghai, I'm sure you bought them from a shady peddler, didn't you?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: チョコを欲ほし続つづける症状しょうじょうがここまで大変たいへんだとはな。＊Shanghai、確たしか怪あやしい行商人ぎょうしょうにんから買かったんだったな?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, I did.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ、そうだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Gosh, why did you buy chocolate from someone you think is so shady?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: もう、どうしてそんな怪あやしいって思おもってる人ひとから＊チョコを買かっちゃったんですか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: B-Because if you were told that there would be no doubt that this year's Valentine's Day sales would explode, wouldn't you be curious even if it was suspicious?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: だ、だって今年ことしのバレンタインで爆売うれ間違まちがいなしって言いわれたらさ、＊怪あやしくても気きになるじゃん?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And this is what happened as the result. Can you please think thrice already? Gosh.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: その結果けっかがこれなんですよ。＊もうちょっとは考かんがえて下くださいよ、もう

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, what happened has already happened. Shanghai, let me check again, you've said you don't know where the peddler is, do you?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: まあ起おきてしまったものは仕方しかたない。＊Shanghai、もう一度いちど確認かくにんするが、＊行商人ぎょうしょうにんの行方ゆくえは分わからないんだな?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. He left very quickly.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うん。すぐにどこか行いっちゃったから

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So I guess this Great Sage's Library is our last resort.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ではやはりこの『大賢者だいけんじゃの書庫しょこ』が最後さいごの頼たのみの綱つなだな

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We're able to have a place like an ancient library so close by, we're really lucky.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: こんな近ちかくに古いにしえの図書館としょかんみたいな場所ばしょがあって＊本当ほんとうにラッキーでしたね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The Great Sage's Library - huh? I wish you had told me earlier that there was such a place on the outskirts of St. Iris, Conductor.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 『大賢者だいけんじゃの書庫しょこ』――か。＊セントイリス郊外こうがいにこんな場所ばしょがあったなら教おしえてほしかったよ、車掌しゃしょう

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No, this is the first time we've heard of this library. The villagers nearby have only recently discovered it.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: いや、この書庫しょこの情報じょうほうはこちらとしても初はじめてだ。＊近ちかくの村人むらびとたちも最近さいきんになって発見はっけんしたようだからな。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is that so? If that's the case, it might have been subjected to a cognitive blocking technique, similar to Nishikese barriers. And for some reason, it was only recently lifted.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そうなのか。だとするとニシキの結界けっかいのように、＊認知にんち阻害そがいの術じゅつでもかけられていたのかもしれないな。＊そしてそれが、最近さいきんになって解とかれた

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's strange, there was no records about it, and the place was only recently discovered, yet it is called the Great Sage, does that mean the owner has been sighted?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それにしても、言い伝いつたえがあったわけでもなく、＊最近さいきんになって発見はっけんされた場所ばしょなのに『大賢者だいけんじゃ』なんて言いわれているのは、＊所有しょゆう者しゃが目撃もくげきされているということなのだろうか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: People in the village said they saw someone who looked like a very wise man going in and out of the place?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 村むらの人ひとたちはいかにも賢者けんじゃのような人じんが＊出入でいりしているのを見みたって言いってましたよ?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So that's what it is. If that's the case, the first thing we should do is to ask this great sage about using his library... There's not a moment to lose. I'll take the liberty of taking a look.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そういうことか。ならば書庫しょこの利用りようについて、＊まずはその大賢者だいけんじゃとやらに断ことわりを入いれるのが筋すじだが......＊一刻いっこくの猶予ゆうよもない。勝手かってに拝見はいけんさせてもらおう

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: In a situation like this, should we still look for medical books?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: こういう時ときはやっぱり医療いりょうの本ほんを探さがすべきでしょうか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We should also look into pharmacology and magic. Conductor and I will look into those, so why don't you check the illustrated books to see if there are any medicinal herbs that might be effective?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 薬学やくがく、魔法まほうについても調しらべてみるべきだな。＊それらは私わたしと車掌しゃしょうで調しらべておくから、＊Tianjinは効ききそうな薬草やくそうがあるか図鑑ずかんを調しらべてくれないか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Then I'll check the local folklore section. Maybe there are stories about people wanting chocolate.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: じゃあわたしは＊この地域ちいきの言い伝いつたえなんかを当あたってみる。＊もしかしたらチョコを欲ほっする話はなしとかあるかもしれないから

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, that's good. We'll split up and look for them.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ、それでいい。＊手分てわけして探さがそう

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai & Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes (of course)!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 了解りょうかい（です）!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Then I'll look in this corner... Ah, I found a medicinal herb book♪ With illustrations too, that's quite an easy find for me!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: じゃあ私わたしはこっちのコーナーを......＊あっ、薬草やくそう図鑑ずかん見みつけました♪＊イラスト付つきだと私わたしでも探さがしやすいですね～

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But are there any medicinal herbs that can help with the symptoms of chocoholism? Can't I just collect all the medicinal herbs that seem to be good for the stomach and feed them to Shanghai?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: でもチョコを欲ほしがる症状しょうじょうに効きく薬草やくそうってあるんでしょうかね?＊胃腸いちょうに効ききそうな薬草やくそうを片かたっ端ぱしから集あつめて＊Shanghaiに食たべさせるんじゃダメなんでしょうか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I definitely don't want to take chances with a roulette and get shot at!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 数かず撃うちゃ当あたるみたいなの、わたし絶対ぜったいイヤだからな!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Not to worry. Bo-shi will identify and remove the deadliest food combinations. Shanghai's more in charge of the folklore and folktales section.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 大丈夫だいじょうぶですよ。＊最悪さいあく死しぬような食たべ合あわせはBo-shiが見分みわけて抜ぬいてくれますから。＊それよりもShanghaiの担当たんとうは伝承でんしょうとか昔話むかしばなしのコーナーですよ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I know. It's just that this place is too quiet and, you know, creepy? What if something daaangerous~ comes out?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 分わかってるよ。＊たださ、ここって静しずかすぎてその、不気味ぶきみじゃん?＊何なにか出でたら危険きけんかな～ーって

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh what? You're afraid of being alone, Shanghai?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 何なにですか、もしかしてShanghaiってば怖こわいんですか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: N-n-nothing. I'm fine on my own. I'm just saying that this is a suspicious place and we should be wary.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ちち、違ちがうぞ。＊わたしはこのくらい、一人ひとりでも平気へいきだ。＊ただ知しらない場所ばしょだから警戒けいかいした方ほうがいいって言いってるんだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Not to worry, I looked around earlier. I even called out to check, but nobody responded. There's no one here, none.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 大丈夫だいじょうぶですよ、さっき私わたしが見回みまわりましたから。＊呼よびかけてもみましたが反応はんのうなし。＊誰だれもいませんよ、ここ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I just saw something move over there!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 今いまあっちで何なにか動うごいた!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...I don't see anything there though?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......何なにもないじゃないですか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmhmm, you won't catch me trying to scare me. Look, I'll also give you the last of the chocolate so that you can be fine by yourself in case you have a seizure again, so Shanghai, please go back to your post as soon as possible.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ふふん、私わたしを怖こわがらせようとしても引ひっかかりませんよ。＊ほら、一人ひとりで発作ほっさが起おきても大丈夫だいじょうぶなように最後さいごのチョコも渡わたしておきますから、＊Shanghaiも早はやく自分じぶんの持もち場ばに行いってくださいよ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Uuugh, but I'm sure I saw it~
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うう、確たしかに見みたのに～ー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shanghai is a mischievous child. I'm not going to fall for the same trick again and again.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Shanghaiってばいたずらっ子こなんですから。＊私わたしも何度なんども引ひっかかったりしないんですからね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now them, the herbs that are good for the stomach are on this page, and the herbs that weaken the effects of magic are over here.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ええっと、胃腸いちょうにいい薬草やくそうはこのページ、＊魔法まほうの効果こうかを弱よわめる薬草やくそうはこっちですね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmhmm, I think I'm getting the hang of looking for them.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ふふ、私わたしも探さがすコツが掴つかめてきたようです

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I need more chocolate, I need more.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: チョコが足たりない、足たりないよお

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hold it Shanghai, that's really the last reserves I have, so please consume it slowly okaay?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ちょっとShanghai、＊本当ほんとうにもうそれで最後さいごなんですから節約せつやくして食たべて下くださいよー?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ......Shanghai?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......Shanghai?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmhmm, is she so focused that she can't hear me then? I can't lose to you either.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ふふ、私わたしの声こえが聞きこえないくらい集中しゅうちゅうしているみたいですね。＊私わたしも負まけていられません

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm still a little concerned about her condition. Is it possible that she had a seizure and can't move...?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: やっぱり少すこし様子ようすが気きになります。＊もしかして発作ほっさが起おきて動うごけない、なんてことは......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh? I thought she was over here, but apparently not... Shanghai, where did you gooooo?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あれ?こっちにいるかと思おもったのにいませんね。＊Shanghaiどこに行いったんですかー?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: There is no reply. Don't tell me that the person Shanghai said was really lurking nearby and attacked...?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 返事へんじがありません。＊まさかShanghaiが言いっていた何者なにものかが＊本当ほんとうに近ちかくに潜ひそんでいて、襲おそわれた......?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: W-woah, what are you doing!? Stop!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うわ、何なにをする!やめろ!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Bo-shi!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Bo-shi!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: WAAAAAAAAH-!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うわあああああー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Bo-shi, what's going on, bo-shi!!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Bo-shiどうしたんですか、Bo-shiっ!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ggh, I'll go and help you right now!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: くっ、今いますぐにお助じょけしますっ!

Title: チョコへの衝動しょうどう
